Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Los Angeles to Boston on 5/3/1989 (Going to LAD: P Roger Clemens. Going to BOS: 2B Eric Young, CF Jim Edmonds, RF Henry Rodriguez)...

Drove in 7 runs against Kansas City on 7/13/1991...
Hit 3 homeruns against Texas, driving in 6 runs on 5/19/1992...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,542,857 through salary arbitration...
